pages.text: Pandema jawajinjile kukwakwe ni kuwecheta kuti: “Ntendele!” Jwalakwe (panyuma pakwajanga ni kwaona kuti ngakulya yakulya yajwawichile) jwatite: “Chisimu uwwe tukun’jogopa wanganyammwe.”
Wanganyao watite: “Nkajogopa! Chisimu uwwe tukumpa abali jakusengwasya janti chinkole mwanache jwakumanyilila nnope.”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ana nkundagulila jele abali jakusengwasyaji kutendaga uchekulu uli ungwayiye kala? Ana abali jamboneji nkundagulila m’matalachi?”
Wanganyao watite: “Tukuntagulila abali jamboneji mwakuonaonape; basi ngasim’ba mwa wakata tama.”
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Ana ninduni jwampaka akate tama kuchanasa cha Ambujegwe, pangawaga wakupotela?”
(Kaneka) jwatite: “Abali jao (jine) jaichile nijapi jaomanja akutumidwa?”
Wanganyao watite: “Chisimu uwwe tutumisyidwe ku wandu wakulewa.”
“Ikaweje waliwasa lya Lutwi, chisimu uwwe chitukajokole wanawose.”
“Pangawanga wankwao, twapimichisye yanti walakweo chawe mwa akusigalila munyuma (chajonanjidwe).”
Basi ndema jawaiche akutumidwa kwiwasa lya Lutwi
Jwalakwe jwatite: “Chisimu wanganyammwe ni wandu wangamanyika (kukwangu).”
Wanganyao watite: “Basi tum’bichilile ni ayila (ilagasyo) yawaliji nkuikaichila.”
“Soni tun’jigalile (abali) jakuonaonape, soni chisimu uwwe wakuonaonape.”

“Basi wigulani niliwasa lyenu mu upande wachilo, sano mmwe mwakuyeje munyuma mwao, nambo akasagalauka jwalijose mwa jenumanja (kulola munyuma ndema jakupikana kulindima kwaipotesi yakuuma kwinani, atakwisa mwaawile), ni n’jendelechele (mwakangamala) kuja kunnamulidwe.”
Ni twammanyisye jwalakwe (Lutwi) lilamusi lyalakweli lyanti: Chisimu njinga sya wanganyao (achimakafilio) chisikatidwe (tajonanjidwe) kumasikusiku
Niwaiche (kwa Lutwi) wandu wa mu nsinda ali wakusengwa (pakupikana kuti ayiche achachanda wakusalala kuti watende yausakwa)
(Lutwi) jwatite: “Chisimu wanganyawa achalendo wangu, basi nkandesya soni (pakwatenda yakusakala).”
“Ni mun’jogope Allah soni nkanjigasya nchesela (pameso pao).”
